answers.answer: No not necessarily. Usually you get really shaky and feel like you're gonna pass out, get really sweaty and feverish. But it's something all us pregos have to do. The drink isn't actually that bad, it tasted like flat sprite to me. Good luck hon
I did mines yesterday n results came back everything is good it does taste like a flat soda but it made me nausea for a while ig my baby lil diva didn't like it lol
N no it doesn't mean u have it usually the symptoms are unexpected swelling sweats dizziness
I am 32+1 and was diagnosed with gestational diabetes at 29 weeks and sugar has never made me sick..

question: My dr has given me a form to get tested for GD.. every time i eat sugar i get extreamly neasous. Could this mean i have this?
title: gestational daibetes?
